attributes.action: Stop the FA selling English footballs biggest asset Wembley stadium
attributes.additional_details: Wembley is the iconic home of football recognised throughout the world , the FA should not sell their largest asset . Somethings simply shouldn’t be sold no matter the price
attributes.background: The Football association have entered talks to sell Wembley stadium , Wembley is the FA’s only major financial asset but more importantantly it’s home of the national football team  .Selling Wembley would seriously damage England’s credibility as a Major footballing nation .

rejection.details:
Any decision about selling Wembley Stadium is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact the FA directly about this issue:
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us

You could start a new petition to ask the UK Government to urge the FA not to sell Wembley Stadium.
